metadata.title: CVE-2023-34478 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Apache Shiro, before 1.12.0 or 2.0.0-alpha-3, may be susceptible to a pathtraversal attack that results in an authentication bypass when usedtogether with APIs or other web frameworks that route requests based onnon-normalized requests. Mitigation: Update to Apache Shiro 1.12.0+ or2.0.0-alpha-3+

criterions.comment: shiro: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
